xwikidoc.name: MenuTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields Menu.MenuClass_content1=メニューの構造
# Live table generic keys menu.livetable.doc.title=ページのタイトル menu.livetable.doc.name=ページの名称 menu.livetable.doc.location=場所 menu.livetable.doc.space=スペース ### Missing: menu.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name ### Missing: menu.livetable.doc.author=Last Author menu.livetable.doc.creator=作者 menu.livetable.doc.date=アップデート日 menu.livetable.doc.creationDate=作成日 menu.livetable._avatar=アバター menu.livetable._images=画像 menu.livetable._attachments=添付ファイル ### Missing: menu.livetable._actions=Actions menu.livetable._actions.edit=編集 menu.livetable._actions.delete=削除 menu.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys menu.livetable.content1=メニューの構造
# Administration keys admin.menu.name=メニュー
# UIX keys menu.uix.extensionPoint.label=メニューの表示場所 menu.uix.extensionPoint.hint=メニューを表示する場所を指定してください。メニューは指定した場所に、水平または垂直に表示されます。 menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.nowhere=表示しない menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.template.header.after=ページのヘッダーの後 menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.panels.rightPanels=右のパネルの内側 menu.uix.extensionPoint.value.panels.leftPanels=左のパネルの内側 ### Missing: menu.uix.content.label=UI Extension Content ### Missing: menu.uix.content.hint=If you can see this then it probably means you have JavaScript disabled. You should select the same value as for the menu display location. ### Missing: menu.uix.scope.label=Menu Visibility Scope ### Missing: menu.uix.scope.hint=Specifies in which context the menu is visible.
# Menu Macro ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.name=Menu ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.description=Displays a menu created using simple wiki syntax (nested lists and links). ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.parameter.id.name=Id ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.parameter.id.description=Optional menu identifier that will be set on the HTML element that wraps the menu. You can use this identifier in JavaScript code to access the menu DOM or in functional tests to assert the menu items. ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.parameter.type.name=Type ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.parameter.type.description=The optional menu type determines the menu appearance and behaviour. The supported values are: horizontal (default value) and vertical. ### Missing: rendering.macro.menu.content.description=Define the menu structure using wiki syntax. Each menu item should be a list item and should contain the menu item label or link. You can use nested lists for sub-menu items.
# Menu WebHome ### Missing: menu.description=This is a simple application that helps you create navigation menus to be displayed either horizontally as a top bar after the page header or vertically in a side panel.
